frontmatter.title: Molecular basis of dengue virus serotype 2 morphological switch from 29°C to 37°C
categories: Atomistic Simulations and Design in Biology
frontmatter.description: The ability of DENV2 to display different morphologies (hence different antigenic properties) complicates vaccine and therapeutics development. Previous studies showed most strains of laboratory adapted DENV2 particles changed from smooth to “bumpy” surfaced morphology when the temperature is switched from 29°C at 37°C.
